{
  "explanation": "The description 'Allows internal Bazaarvoice web analytics to be correlated to the same user browsing session for interactions across the Bazaarvoice network' primarily refers to tracking user interactions for analytics across sessions on the Bazaarvoice network. This implies Service Usage Analytics since it involves analyzing data to understand usage patterns across the network. It also involves aspects of Customer Relationship Management as it deals with understanding user interactions and optimizing overall customer experience. However, service personalisation specifically refers to customising services, which is closely related but not a match to the exact use case of correlating web analytics for user sessions.",
  "results": [36, 78],
  "unmatchedConcepts": ["Personalisation"]
}
```
